item.name: Home
item.description: One of the first things I learned to veganize was chocolate cake for my husband—who has a sweet tooth—and this Chocolate Cake with Strawberry Frosting is a recipe I developed for him this year. In lieu of filling this space with SEO driving drivel, here’s a short little snippet I wrote about him the other […]
